column3:
â€œMy intent was to acquire some Sour Tsunami. Because of miscommunication I ended up with 1/8 of Ox.

While it's not what I wanted, it is beautiful. The flowers are super dense with trichomes to spare. Unlike anything I've smelled. Just a hint of the typical cannabis smell, but a very strong sweet, citrus scent. The smoke was tasty and incredibly smooth from a clean bowl.

Not nearly as overpowering cerebrally as I was...â€

â€œThis strain helped me immensely with my fibromyalgia pain for a few hours but didn't relax my anxiety or mood much. More of a pain blocker while feeling in control and not very high. Great to function on in daily situations like classes or work.â€

â€œAbsolutely love this strain. The purple color really pops and it tastes spicy and earthy. The best part are the effects...everything seems brighter and more beautiful. My entire body seems to melt but my head stays sharp. Do yourself a favor; smoke this strain, take a walk outside and enjoy life.â€

â€œThis is a fantastic strain. You get the normal euphoric feeling of a deep indica, but it doesn't couch lock you. You stay clear headed enough to enjoy every moment of the high. The purple color of the buds is beautiful and the crystals ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ I highly recommend this strain.â€

â€œThis is an amazing cross. The pheno I had definitely expressed the DJ Short genetics.  Fruity coffee flavors relaxed my muscles and mind . I would recommend this to anyone trying to relieve pain or pressure. Perfect example of what a good indica should be.â€

â€œAlso know as the CBD OX. Was a nice indica cbd strain. Very similar effects from the Nordle strain. Even though Nordle is on the rise right now I'd still recommend getting your hands on this. Very relaxed worry free high. ğŸ‘ğŸ¼â€
â€œRelaxed, funny, but still won in a landslide at Trivial Pursuit while playing with my super smart and not stoned husband. Easy and enjoyable with no twinges of panic or anxiety.â€
â€œAmazing strain my body is melting but I'm still in full control. Tastes very good too. Definitely my second favourite strain. Will use again.â€
â€œThis Is Great!  This Made Me Feel Very Relaxed And Helped With My Fibromyalgia Pain A Lot. I Love This Strain! Great Taste, Great Smell, Great Feeling!â€

â€œI've never tasted an ox before, but if I ever do I hope it tastes as good as this bud! a trippy chocolate coffee taste totally recommend smoking it for an all day euphoria without crashing too hardâ€
â€œI grew this and it was my favorite indicate before I grew black domina. She yields low and not a plant for a beginner. Great smoke though.â€
â€œThis strain is amazing. The taste is great. It gave me a great euphoric feeling, but did not couch lock me. After a couple bowls, I still felt clear headed and was able to enjoy the high.â€
â€œpicked up an eigth of this stuff last week. very relaxing calming high. put me to sleep right away thoâ€
â€œits a very good strong body high I like the coffee taste it had as I smoked it its also very relaxing and pain reliving it also gave me a floaty feelingâ€

â€œThis is the first high CBD strain I've really messed with so take the following with a grain of salt. The concentrate has become my new morning routine and leaves me feeling great throughout the morning but without the head high. Nausea and head-ache problems literally gone before the vape left my mouth, but I can still function 110%. Nice chocolate taste with a bit of medicine-y background. A little bit of an acquir...â€
